title: Assam: Nirmala Sitharaman lays foundation for University that will focus on AI, cybersecurity, drone tech, quantum computing
description: The upcoming institution, Assam's first Technology and Vocational Education and Training (T-VET) University, will be developed at a project cost of Rs 415 crore and is envisioned to shape a skilled, future-ready generation equipped in cutting-edge fields such as Artificial Intelligence, Cybersecurity, Drone Technology, and Quantum Computing.
content:
Gohpur (Assam) [India], November 8 (ANI): Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman laid the foundation stone for Swahid Kanaklata Barua State University at Gohpur on Saturday.
The upcoming institution, Assam's first Technology and Vocational Education and... [3142 chars]

title: Debt Has Entered the A.I. Boom
description: To fund heavy spending on infrastructure for artificial intelligence, companies have leveraged a growing list of complex debt-financing options.

title: Arsenal Using AI? Mikel Arteta Uses Technology To End 22-Year Wait For Premier League Title
description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta reveals the club uses Artificial Intelligence for tactical analysis as they chase their first Premier League title in 22 years.
content:

title: 'I was sort of mocked': Deepika Padukone remembers being targeted for her voice during early career days
description: Deepika Padukone recently reflected on how her voice, once mocked at the start of her career, has now become her strength as she lends it to Meta AI. Speaking at CNBCs Global Leadership Summit, the actor called it “strange” that the same accent she was criticised for is now celebrated globally. She also shared her excitement about artificial intelligence but emphasised that human emotion remains irreplaceable.
content:

title: Senate measure would support limits on AI chip sales to China
description: WASHINGTON — Senators on both sides of the aisle on Thursday signed onto a call to keep advanced artificial intelligence chips from being sold to China. Sen. Chris Coons, D-Del., unveiled an as-yet unnumbered resolution focused on the importance of maintaining U.S. “primacy in artificial intelligence” and on restricting access to the chips required to build so-called frontier AI models. content:

WASHINGTON — Senators on both sides of the aisle on Thursday signed onto a call to keep advanced artificial intelligence chips from being sold to China.

title: Sam Altman drops a shocking hint about who he wants as OpenAI’s CEO; says it ‘clearly will happen someday’
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has predicted that companies led entirely by artificial intelligence are imminent, declaring that “shame on me if OpenAI isnt the first big company run by an AI CEO.” Speaking on the Conversations with Tyler podcast, he suggested this could happen within a few years. While Altman envisions AI outperforming human executives, he admits human presence will still matter, highlighting a coming era of AI-driven corporate leadership.
